amendment.description: An amendment numbered 6 printed in Part B of House Report 116-2 to provide increased funding for hazardous fuels management activities to increase the resiliency of federal forests, to protect against catastrophic wildfires and reduce the amount of damage caused by such fires.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Stewart amendment (A006) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Stewart amendment (A006) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A006) offered by Mr. Stewart.
